user_already_exist: User is already in the room
user_not_exist: User is not in the room
not_in_room: You are not in any room
not_host: You are not the host and cannot perform this action
room_in_ready_state: Room is in ready state, cannot join
room_already_cycled: Room is already in cycle mode
room_already_not_cycled: Room is no longer in cycle mode
user_duplicate_join: You cannot join the server multiple times
room_duplicate_create: You cannot create the same room twice.
room_duplicate_join: You cannot join the same room twice.
